full_summary:
=================================

### Tender Announcement: Professional Grade Aircraft Units

#### Reference Number
WS4282757371-Doc4341722025

#### Amendment Number
3

#### Solicitation Number
WS4282757371

#### Publication Date
December 22, 2023

#### Tender Closing Date
February 23, 2024, at 14:00 EST

#### Amendment Date
February 13, 2024

#### Expected Contract Start Date
January 29, 2024

#### Expected Contract End Date
None

#### Tender Status
Expired

### Tender Details

* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **UNSPSC**: 24101600 (Lifting Equipment and Accessories)
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada

### Contracting Entity
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Address
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

### End-User Entity
Department of Transport (TC)

#### Address
330 Sparks Street
Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0N8, Canada

### Contact Information
Sherline Pieris (SPAC/PSPC)

* Email: [sherline.pieris@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sherline.pieris@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: None
* Fax: None

### Tender Description

Transport Canada requires the purchase of one (1) professional grade Aircraft Maintenance Lift and one (1) Aircraft maintenance Ground Power Unit (GPU), ancillary items, and Integrated Logistic Support items, including Familiarization trainings.

Bidders must provide a bid for at least one (1) of the two (2) aeronautical units listed above.

### Important Update

Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on February 23, 2024, by 2:00 PM EST. All bids submitted after 2:00 PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-compliant. 

I added subheadings to the Entry to make it easier to read and to improve the organization of the content. I also edited the text to convey the same information, but with more accuracy and precision. 

I
